name: Bright Minds Learning Center
description: Support for children with dyslexia and ADHD.
longDescription: Bright Minds offers personalized sessions, parent workshops, and educational assessments for children facing dyslexia, ADHD, and related challenges.

name: Focus Educational Services
longDescription: Focus provides early intervention programs, behavior analysis, and tailored academic support for preschool and primary school children.

name: Steps to Success
longDescription: Steps to Success helps children with motor coordination issues and academic challenges through occupational therapy and specialized tutoring.

name: Mindful Growth Center
description: Support for children with autism and communication needs.
longDescription: Mindful Growth Center specializes in autism spectrum disorders, offering structured programs including social skills groups and speech therapy.

name: Thrive Learning Hub
longDescription: Thrive offers evaluations and custom learning plans through a team of psychologists, therapists, and special educators.

name: Bridge to Learning
longDescription: Bridge to Learning partners with schools and parents to integrate inclusive education strategies, classroom adaptations, and staff training.

name: Hope & Harmony
longDescription: Hope & Harmony provides counseling services to children with anxiety, behavioral issues, and trauma through evidence-based therapy models.

name: Empower Kids Institute
longDescription: Empower Kids Institute provides developmental support focused on language acquisition, articulation, and early learning delays.
